name: My Ten-day Girlfriend
description:
[Background]

The story takes place on a tropical island named “Highland Island”, where the Middle Age Devil died.
My travel gets really SPECIAL because of this mysterious island.
After everything shows me that I’m the son of the Devil, what I should do with my POWER? to conquer the world? or end my single life?

[Game Features]

1. Tropical island style of enviroment

2. Day and night changes in the game

3. Over 30 exquisite CG paintings

4. 7 different endings

5. Funny side story & funny NPC

We’ve been working hard to bring more multi-line of the story to our audience, please stay tuned for our upcoming updates, thanks.
